headline: GTA Online
subtitle: ITâ€™S A STEAL
content: You spot a thief leaving a shop laden with stolen goods. Do you A) Do what the LSPD are supposed to do, nail the thief, and return the goods, B) Introduce the wrongdoer to your loadout and keep the stolen goods for yourself, or C) Cheer them on for sticking it to the man? With shoplifting on the rise across Los Santos, the choice might come sooner than you think.
